patthana8.1:6.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana8.1:6.2: nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana8.1:6.8: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana8.1:6.12: nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.1:7.1: Na nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:7.2: Na nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:7.3: Na nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.1:8.1: Nahetuñca na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:8.2: Nahetuñca na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:8.3: Nahetuñca na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana8.1:12.1: Na nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:12.2: Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:12.3: Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana8.1:13.1: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:13.2: Nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:13.3: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana8.1:14.1: Na nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:14.2: Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:14.3: Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana8.1:15.1: Nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:15.2: Nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:15.3: Nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:16.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi … pe … kamme tīṇi … pe … jhāne tīṇi … pe … vippayutte pañca … pe … avigate nava.
